ContentStructure.title: Select the letter the Campaign Name starts with
Click the column title to sortalphabetically or numerically
Select the People List Campaign Name
Click Manage Members to add a contact or lead
Select the checkbox next to the new member
Click the Name of the Contact or Lead
The contact or lead is now a member of the People List
The Subcategory is “Campaign: Create New Campaign”
People List versus Email Campaign List
Add members Edit contact information Unsubscribe
Right click on the template you want to use
Select your site’s campaign Folder (not Program Template Library!)
Type the name you used in the Service Desk Case
Paste the copied text in the Name field
Right click on the template you want to delete
Right click the template you want to use
Sender should be recognizable and trusted.
Click on a piece of content
Choose your site’s folder to “Search in”
Click Save to add the element
Click the text you want to edit
Choose or type one Lead email address
Select the email template you need to approve
Access the Email Actions dropdown menu
Which characteristic(s) match the definition of a People List? Select all that apply.
That’s correct! Click Next to continue.
Incorrect - People lists are only maintained in cychannel and may change in size, but not in nature. Click Next to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: Which characteristic(s) match the definition of a People List? Select all that apply.

ContentStructure.title: Which characteristic(s) match the definition of a one-time use Email Campaign List? Select all that apply.
You’ve got it! Click Next to continue.
Incorrect - One-time use Email Campaign Lists are created in cychannel and are synced with Marketo. They do not change over time and can only be used once. Click Next to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: Which characteristic(s) match the definition of a one-time use Email Campaign List? Select all that apply.

ContentStructure.title: A contact or lead must be added to cychannel before they can be part of a People List.
Incorrect - A person must be added as a contact or lead in cychannel before adding them to a People List. Click Next to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: True/False
question.text: A contact or lead must be added to cychannel before they can be part of a People List.

ContentStructure.title: Which of the following is not an example of a People List?
Incorrect - The December Newsletter 2014 is an example of a one-time use Email Campaign List. Click Next to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: Which of the following is not an example of a People List?

ContentStructure.title: Click the area of Marketo where the email template is edited.
Incorrect - Email templates are edited in the Marketing Activities area. Click Next to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Hot Spot
question.text: Click the area of Marketo where the email template is edited.

ContentStructure.title: Order the steps of creating an email in Marketo.
Incorrect - The correct sequence is Choose, Clone, Delete, Edit, and Send. Click Next to continue.

question.title: Sequence
question.text: Order the steps of creating an email in Marketo.
